DOC.brief_summary: Approximately 300 patient female sexual arousal disorder meet eligibility criterion enrol randomize receive either active drug match placebo . After two-month , non-treatment period , patient receive study drug 6 month record information sexual encounter daily diary . Study drug apply directly genital area 30-60 minute initiation sexual activity . The endpoint study base use standard measure sexual function ( FSEP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Topical Alprostadil Female Sexual Arousal Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , parallel-design study involve 300 woman 21-60 year age inclusive , undergone hysterectomy ( without oophorectomy ) , primary diagnosis FSAD . The diagnosis FSAD make base medical sexual history confirm use structure interview trained personnel . Study subject undergo 2-month non-treatment run-in period follow 6-month period blind study therapy . Study drug apply topically genitalia 30-60 minute prior initiation sexual activity . Study subject complete several questionnaire various time study complete daily diary . The study endpoint base FSEP standard questionnaire , well safety tolerability study drug .
DOC.criteria: Women age 2160 undergone hysterectomy Have primary diagnosis female sexual arousal disorder Be willing comply study requirement visit schedule Known allergy alprostadil product excipients Have genital inflammatory infectious condition STD Have significant medical condition would interfere study Have receive investigational drug within prior 30 day
